{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=2.0B |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50712;XWAY DANUBE-S (PSB 50712); |cpu1_cspeed=333 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F5608U0D-JIB0 |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=Spansion |fla2_model=S29AL004D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H511638F |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9160 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996I |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=ADSL2+, DECT, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :{{WPLink|BT_Home_Hub}} *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/bt/homehub_v2b BT Home Hub 2B on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :SoC: [[Lantiq]] XWAY DANUBE-S (PSB 50712) [[MIPS 24Kc]] ===Hardware=== 
Architecture:	MIPS
Vendor:		Lantiq
Bootloader:	U-Boot
System-On-Chip:	Lantiq Danube-S PSB 50712 (MIPS 24Kec)
CPU/Speed:	333 MHz Dual Core
NOR Flash:	Spansion S29AL004D 512KiB
NAND Flash:	Samsung K9F5608U0D-JIB0 32MiB
RAM Chip:	Samsung K4H511638F
RAM Specs:	64 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros 9160-BC1A 802.11b/g/n, 
		pci, 0x18000000, irq 22
Ethernet:	Infineon AD9669I
USB:		Yes
DECT:		SiTel SC14488
SLIC:	Teridian 73m1966, Infineon Vinetic PEF4268F 
        Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		?
__NOTOC__
